title: Comp ogre bow

This is the only composite bow that can be made through the Fletching skill at level 30.

Item ID4827

The comp ogre bow was released with the quest Zogre Flesh Eaters and is made by using a knife on an achey tree logs with wolf bones in a player's inventory to create an unstrung comp bow, which can then be strung with a bow string to create the finished bow. This is the only composite bow that can be made through the Fletching skill at level 30.

When compared to the normal ogre bow, the comp bow has the same attack bonus and a faster attack speed, but a shorter range. It requires 30 Ranged to wield.

It uses brutal arrows, which are fashioned from achey tree log arrow shafts and different types of nails, effective in killing zogres. It can also be used to fire ogre arrows, effective in killing chompy birds and jubblies.

In order to equip this bow, players must first speak with Grish after reaching a certain point in the Zogre Flesh Eaters (before the final battle).

Players can click the Check option on the ogre bow or comp ogre bow to check how many chompy birds they have killed in the Big Chompy Bird Hunting activity, to see if they qualify for a Chompy bird hat.

The Void Knight equipment set's accuracy bonuses do stack with the Ogre bow, however, the damage bonus does not get applied.[1] Because of this, wearing offensive ranged armour such as black dragonhide armour is much more effective when hunting chompies.

[[File:Comp ogre bow detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''comp ogre bow''' was released with the quest [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]] and is made by using a knife on an [[achey tree logs]] with [[wolf bones]] in a player's inventory to create an [[unstrung comp bow]], which can then be strung with a [[bow string]] to create the finished bow. This is the only composite bow that can be made through the [[Fletching]] skill at level 30.

When compared to the normal [[ogre bow]], the comp bow has the same attack bonus and a faster attack speed, but a shorter range. It requires 30 [[Ranged]] to wield.

It uses [[brutal arrows]], which are fashioned from achey tree log [[ogre arrow shaft|arrow shafts]] and different types of [[nails]], effective in killing [[zogre]]s. It can also be used to fire [[ogre arrow]]s, effective in killing [[chompy bird]]s and [[Jubbly bird|jubblies]].

In order to equip this bow, players must first speak with [[Grish]] after reaching a certain point in the [[Zogre Flesh Eaters]] (before the final battle).

Players can click the Check option on the [[ogre bow]] or comp ogre bow to check how many [[chompy bird]]s they have killed in the [[Big Chompy Bird Hunting]] activity, to see if they qualify for a [[Chompy bird hat]].

The [[Void Knight equipment]] set's accuracy bonuses do stack with the Ogre bow, however, the damage bonus does not get applied.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1169527067358183424|date=5 September 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/rOaNt|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=The accuracy benefits do stack. I've previously confirmed that they didn't stack with a lot of such effects, but the accuracy calculation appears to have changed in July.}} Because of this, wearing offensive ranged armour such as [[black dragonhide armour]] is much more effective when hunting chompies.
